scripts.fprod: npm run svnupdate && ng build --prod --aot -op www
scripts.fdev: npm run svnupdate && ng build -op www
scripts.package: npm run fprod && npm run bprod
scripts.packagedev: npm run fdev && npm run bdev
scripts.packageproddev: npm run fprod && npm run bproddev
scripts.deploy: npm run packageproddev && npm run upload
scripts.deployb: npm run bproddev && npm run upload
